title: Why does Trump want recess appointments? 5 things to know
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has declared a strong intention to use recess appointments in his next term. What are recess appointments?

title: No, satellite was not destroyed to hide election rigging | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no evidence the election was rigged or that the destruction of a SpaceX satellite was part of a cover-up.

title: Tight race for Senate in PA headed to recount
shortDescription: Pennsylvania will recount the race between incumbent Democratic Sen. Bob Casey and Republican David McCormick, who leads by 28,000 votes.

title: No, Trump didn't pick Amber Rose as education secretary | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no credible evidence to support the claim. A purported statement about Rose does not appear on any of Trump's social media accounts.

title: Matt Gaetz resigns from Congress
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's nominee for attorney general, Matt Gaetz, was under criminal investigation before he resigned from Congress.

title: Majority in national popular vote chose Trump | Fact check
shortDescription: Trump received 75.9 million votes as of Nov. 14. That's more than the total for Harris and all third-party candidates combined.

title: Trump expected to meet Argentine President Milei at Mar-a-Lago
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump is expected to meet with Argentine President Javier Milei while the leader attends a conference at Mar-a-Lago.

title: Is Matt Gaetz a lawyer? More about Trump's attorney general pick
shortDescription: Donald Trump named Matt Gaetz as his attorney general pick. Here's what to know about his prior experience.

title: Why Howard Lutnick, Trump's transition co-chair, has a big job
shortDescription: Executing a successful presidential transition requires serious planning, said Max Stier, president and CEO of the Partnership for Public Service.

title: Trump considering ban on vaccines, fluoride in second term
shortDescription: Former President Donald Trump stated in a recent interview that he expects Robert F. Kennedy to have a “big role” in a second administration, specifically in the public health sector.

title: FBI offers $25,000 reward for info on suspect in ballot box fires
shortDescription: The FBI is offering a $25,000 reward for information on a suspect behind ballot box arsons in the Pacific Northwest ahead of the Nov. 5 election.

title: Trump transition live coverage: Trump picks RFK Jr. to lead HHS
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump is still choosing his nominees for his second term in the White House − and making some surprising picks.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump's dream scenario
shortDescription: Republicans win control of House and Senate. Here is the news to know on Thursday.

title: Supreme Court whiplash: What Trump's win means for guns and transgender care
shortDescription: A new Trump administration could change course on Supreme Court cases over transgender care for minors and untraceable "ghost guns."

title: Trump's team drawing up list of Pentagon officers to fire, sources say
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's transition team is planning to clean house at the Pentagon by firing several military officers.

title: Trump announces three cabinet appointments
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump announced plans to hire former Rep. Matt Gaetz, Sen. Marco Rubio and Tulsi Gabbard in his next administration.

title: Trump Cabinet picks: Here's who may join his second administration
shortDescription: Donald Trump announced more campaign loyalists could join his administration, inducing Matt Gaetz, Tulsi Gabbard and Marco Rubio.

title: House Republicans agree to make it harder to oust their speaker
shortDescription: The procedural tool was used to kick former Speaker Kevin McCarthy out of his position in October 2023.

title: Matt Gaetz resigns from Congress after Donald Trump picks him as AG
shortDescription: Rep. Matt Gaetz, R-Fla., has resigned from Congress, House Speaker Mike Johnson, R-La., announced on Wednesday.

title: 'We’re just on day 1’: Republicans, Democrats gear up for GOP trifecta
shortDescription: Republicans are giddy and preparing for at least two years with a trifecta. Democrats are reassessing their losses and looking to Trump's agenda.

title: What is DOGE, the proposed agency led by Elon Musk under Trump?
shortDescription: A proposed Department of Government Efficiency, or DOGE, is set to restructure federal agencies and slash government spending.

title: RFK Jr. criticizes Donald Trump's fast food habits: 'Poison'
shortDescription: RFK Jr. supports President-elect Donald Trump's policies but not his fast-food diet. On a podcast, the former candidate bashes Trump's menu choices.

title: Trump jokes about 2028 run with Republican help
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump told congressional Republicans he will not run in 2028 unless they "do something" which was met with laughter.
